reviews.text: Ok, i have just returned from my 5day trip to taipei in july 2007. I travelled with a group of 6 friends and the first night there, my other 4 friends received a room at the basement, which had no windows, and was rather cramped. The air-conditioning there was rather cold too.
reviews.title: Dashin hotel.. not that bad, but not that good either

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Me on the other hand received on of their larger rooms on the 6th floor since we requested for 3-in a room. The air-conditioning was rather lousy, and as we were there during the summer period, it was quite warm during the night.
reviews.title: Good value! Clean rooms!

likes.liked: — room and air was clean, friendly staff, free breakfast, many channels on TV,
likes.disliked: — slightly out of the way if you want to shop

reviews.text: The hotel staff however are extemely friendly and they really do make you feel very welcomed. The room which i got was definitely better than my other friends since there were more space, however, there was something wrong with the showers as the heating mechanism was dysfunctional. And we were in for a rude shock when we realised that the hotel had provided free porn channels. Definitely a no-go if you have children with you.
reviews.title: Delight Hotel ( Dashin Hotel)
Beyond our expectations!
reviews.text: The hotel is not very near the zhongshan station, and you need to walk a good 10 minutes to get there. I would suggest that you visit outside the summer period as the heat is rather stifling, which doesnt help when your hotel is tucked away in a corner from the station.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The best thing about Dahshin is its location - about a 5 minute walk from the MRT, in a good neighborhood with a couple big department stores, lots of tasty restaurants and street food. Otherwise, the place itself is nothing special, a bit outdated and on par with a 3 star motel. We changed rooms during our two night stay because the bathroom in the first room was leaking water and very badly designed (tiny tub with shower head but no shower curtain.) Other notes: there was a free porn channel that appeared to play European porn that was, inexplicably, dubbed. The room also came with a free condom that read "Fuji Say Yes Condom." To be fair though, I think this is fairly common in Taipei hotels.
reviews.title: Good location, but just okay.

reviews.text: I had a very pleasant 6-day stay at Dahshin hotel during my trip to taipei. Firstly, the location is good and non-dodgy. it is situated near Zhongshan MRT in the business district area with many reputable hotels, banks and shopping centres in the area. The walk to Zhongshan MRT is about 5 minutes via some rather-confusing underpasses (only initially, once we got used to it, it's actually very simple).
reviews.title: Dahshin Hotel

likes.disliked: — The lack of variety for breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Next, the staff are very friendly and courteous people i must say. Always smiling and keen to help. I enquired regarding the train schedules and fares, the receptionist immediately lend me a book containing all the info which i thought was really helpful. She even handed me her namecard and requested for my contact details so that if she comes over to singapore, she can help me bring over some taiwan goodies.
reviews.title: Delight (Da Lai) is great!

reviews.text: Cleanliness deserves 5 stars!! didn't spot a speck of dirt in the toilet. the bed linen are clean and soft. (the bed and pillow could be more comfortable though.) They do housekeeping everyday and replenishes the toiletries and towels everyday.
reviews.title: Very clean

likes.liked: — clean room, friendly staffs, and great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very well-stocked up in terms of toiletries and some essentials. Hairdryer, room slippers, hangers, tea cups, tea/coffee satchets, 2 free bottles of mineral water, fridge, tv, razor blade, shower cap, shampoo, toothbrush/paste, etc.
reviews.title: Clean, modern, economical, excellent!
